author: missirol
body:
#### PR description:

This PR applies small technical tweaks to some of the unit tests used in HLT packages.

  - The main change is to show the outputs of the tests in stdout/err, as opposed to redirecting them to a log file.
  - Other changes are just to make the structure+naming of the tests more uniform across subpackages.

#### PR validation:

Unit tests pass.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported, please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
title: show outputs of HLT unit tests
